channel.title: Client run
channel.description:
hey i just got back to creating servers I would like to start a new project but I don't really remember too much so my problem is when i run my delta client it just opens the java cmd for like 40 mili seconds and then quickly closes it self i added a pause to the end of it and it had no errors or anything it just had the "click to exit"
here is my client code [code]@echo off title client start javaw -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 "C:\program files (x86)\java\jre6\bin\java.exe" jframe 10 o highmem members 32 pause exit[/code]
please help me :P
thanks

item.title: Client run
item.dc:creator: @badbeex badbeex
item.description:
@badbeex wrote:

okay it did’nt work so im going to try a new source thanks for trying to help me

Read full topic

item.title: Client run
item.dc:creator: @usmanm786 usmanm786
item.description:
@usmanm786 wrote:

[quote=“badbeex, post:3, topic:452872”]ok i fixed the jre6 path but now the error is

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
try changing to javac.exe and make sure the path is correct. and its pause not exit pause and if it doesnt work try a better source i think

Read full topic
